place.name: The Krusty Krab
place.description: You are surrounded by the sweet smell of Krabby Patties, sit down and take a bite.

place.name: The Chum Bucket
place.description: You are standing infront of Plankton and a horrible smell hits your nose. You probably should turn back.

place.name: Bikini Bottom
place.description: You are standing in a fork in the road, with a rumbling stomach, choose your fate to find some good grub.
